name: C&N Financial Services, Inc.
description: C&N Financial Services, Inc. operates as a bank holding company that provides a wide range of financial services to individuals and businesses. Established in 1864, C&N has built a strong reputation for its commitment to customer service and community engagement. The company offers traditional banking products such as checking and savings accounts, loans, and mortgages, as well as investment services and insurance solutions. C&N is dedicated to enhancing the financial well-being of its customers by offering tailored financial advice and personalized services. With a focus on innovation, C&N has embraced digital banking technologies to provide customers with convenient access to their accounts and financial resources. The company operates multiple branches across Pennsylvania and New York, emphasizing its role as a community partner. C&N’s mission is to provide exceptional service while fostering long-term relationships with its clients, ensuring they achieve their financial goals.

seo.meta_title: C&N Financial Services, Inc. | Banking and Financial Solutions
seo.meta_description: C&N Financial Services, Inc. offers comprehensive banking and financial solutions to support individuals and businesses. Learn about our products and services.

faq.question: What services does C&N offer?
faq.answer: C&N offers banking, investment, and insurance services to individuals and businesses.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of C&N?
faq.answer: Mike D. O'Connor is the CEO of C&N Financial Services, Inc.

faq.question: Where is C&N headquartered?
faq.answer: C&N is headquartered in Wellsboro, Pennsylvania, USA.

faq.question: What types of accounts can I open with C&N?
faq.answer: C&N offers checking accounts, savings accounts, and various loan products.
